name: Initial Site Survey & Site Safety
Site access is adequate and safe
The openings have been suitably prepared for installation
SWMS signed off (if applicable)
All materials are on site including fixings
Daily Site Safety
No new risks or hazards have arisen on site
Materials have been stored safely and are undamaged
Installer/s wearing correct PPE and are fit for work
Incident Report
The injury is only minor and the installer can continue work
If above checkpoint is FAIL, the office have been notified and installer referred to appropriate care
Report has been filled and signed by casualty
Fyrehalt V / Smokehalt V / Fibershield V / Windowhalt / Windowshield
Installation
Sheet metal installed
Curtain barrel and bottom bar installed
Control box installed and wired OR fusible link
Works by others & additional comments / photos
Power and alarm has been provided
Have work/s by others been provided? (if applicable)
Other 1
Other 2
Other 3
Commissioning
All gaps sealed with fire-rated sealant
All plugs (caps), tags, and signage has been installed
All controllers connected to 240v power
All control box lids are fixed in place
Obstruction sensors installed (if applicable)
Rewind switches installed (if applicable)
Battery backup installed (if applicable)
Strobes and sounders installed (if applicable)
All curtains deploy correctly on activation
All curtains flush with ceiling
Photos taken of completed install and commissioning
Defects
No paint touch ups required (if fail, please specify)
No damage by others (if fail, please specify)
No materials damaged (if fail, please specify)
No gaps greater than 3mm (if fail, please specify)
All products correctly ordered and manufactured (if fail, please specify)
